display_long_description:
VRFS is a community-driven soccer (football) simulator focused on realistic physics and competitive multiplayer.

Main features of VRFS:

PHYSICS SIMULATION: Perform almost any trick—from balancing the ball on your foot to executing curved power shots or long passes. The ball’s trajectory is fully determined by the physics engine.

COMPETITIVE MULTIPLAYER: Experience instantaneous ball-touch response. For example, you can finish powerful crosses as fast as in real soccer.

COMFORT: Move with thumbsticks and play seated or standing. No intense hand motions are required.

NO PAY-TO-WIN: Skill determines success. No one can buy “stronger kicks” or “faster boots.” Practice leads to improvement.

FREE FOR ALL: Full access without any mandatory purchases. Optional cool gear is available to support further development.

Please note, VRFS is still in development, with upcoming physics and scenery enhancements. We welcome your suggestions for improvements.
